form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Fever> Positive Malaria Test

field.name: Does the child have any of the following conditions?
Severe febrile disease with severe malaria
field.options: Any General danger sign OR | Stiff neck OR | Signs of Severe Malaria | Persistent vomiting | Convulsions | Lethargy / unconsciousness | Dark, cola-coloured urine | Persistent fever ≥ 38.5ºC | Unable to sit or stand| Jaundice | Severe pallor | Shock | Bleeding | Click here to take action

field.name: Uncomplicated malaria
